title: ABOUT US
heading: KCERA Inc
text:
KCERA is a tooling system company which established in July 2013 and is leading the way in realizing customer satisfaction with the best cutting tool solutions. KCERA has established itself as a specialized tooling system company from tool design, development and test with know-how and technology accumulated through the efforts of all employees since its establishment.

Constructing medium and high valued brand images KCERA pursues customer’s value through high quality sales activities, consulting and competitive price in domestic and overseas cutting tool market with premium new grade, C/B development and superior quality management compared to other companies.

Small Difference Makes Luxury Tools KCERA strives to contribute to the cutting tool cost savings with slogan “Small Difference Makes Luxury Tools” and the experimental spirit of exploring and developing the infinite possibilities of cutting tools. I will do my best.
